articles.title: Indian Family Of 4 Freeze To Death Near US-Canada Border - NDTV
articles.description: In a heartbreaking tragedy, a family of four Indians, including a baby, has died from exposure to extreme cold weather on the Canadian side of the border with the US in an apparent human smuggling operation.
articles.content:
All four bodies were located within 9-12 metres of the border. (Representational)
